lender.name: pat
lender.loan_because: I hope to help others all over the world with their business ventures since I also have a small business too! Peace and best wishes to all!

lender.name: suki
lender.loan_because: I want to change the world.

lender.name: matslats
lender.loan_because: I believe in human rights, I have spare money, and want to use it better than a commercial bank.
lender.occupational_info: I make websites for non-profit organisations

lender.name: Adi S
lender.loan_because: I just a student on college and work part time on internet cafe
lender.occupational_info: I'am a operator internet cafe in Jogjakarta - Indonesia.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: As a true Christian, it is imperative to help all people. Christ has blessed my family more than I could ever imagine. Hopefully these loans will bless others.
lender.occupational_info: Sales manager

lender.name: Kimberly
lender.loan_because: I can..I would not be were I am, or have what I have, if not for being able to borrow.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: Major social and economic change only happens at the individual - personal level.
lender.occupational_info: Manage design and fabrication for a sign company.

lender.name: Wilbur
lender.loan_because: To help others where possible
lender.occupational_info: I work on oracle database for a large retailer from Minnesota, USA.

lender.name: Jerry
lender.loan_because: Kiva has made it easy to pass forward the gratitude I have, for all that I have been given and at times, have taken for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I work with communities to realize their visions for the rivers, trails, and open spaces most important to them. I help them form the partnerships required to effectively conserve, protect & restore the places they value most.

lender.name: Cassondra
lender.loan_because: This is such a great opportunity for those of us with limited means, or without huge sums of free cash, to make a real difference in the world. I've always felt a little helpless in the face of some of the world's problems. "What, " I have asked, "Can one person really do?" And suddenly, I've found my answer.
lender.occupational_info: I love my job because not only do I love books, but because, essentially, I love helping people. I do all sorts of different kinds of helping -- from helping someone find a good book to read, to helping someone find materials to learn English, to helping people find out how to fill out job applications and resumes. I especially love introducing children to the infinite world of books and reading.

lender.name: Josie
lender.loan_because: I'm involved with kiva because I can't imagine the impossibilities of 'making it' without credit institutions.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: It seems like the right thing to do.

lender.name: LilithsCircle
lender.loan_because: We want to engage with the global community by promoting individual businesses which are improving the quality of life for those involved.
lender.occupational_info: You will find us everywhere doing almost anything that requires creativity, compassion and bravery.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: As the daughter of immigrants, I know the challenges of flourishing financially, and how much a little loan can go a long way. I don't make much money, however I make enough to get by - therefore it is my duty to give when I can. I think everyone just needs a little support sometimes.
lender.occupational_info: I just graduated from college, my major was acting. I also write plays and short stories. I recently moved to New York where I waitress/bartend by day and act in plays by night.

lender.name: Laura
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to better their life, and if I can help, I will.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: The difference between me and others is often based on where we were born, not on capabilities. It seems logical to share and allow others opportunities I came by easily.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies make sure the work the do can be done without hurting their workers, hurting the environment or making products that could hurt the customers

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I saw Kiva featured on a PBS program and want to help.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: Helping others become empowered is a great feeling! We all need a leg up.
lender.occupational_info: I love to teach in an interactive, creative way. I incorporate music, art and drama into teaching writing. I also hope to inspire kids to love reading.

lender.name: The Tais
lender.loan_because: We all have been blessed with abundance in the States and God calls us to share with those who have less.

lender.name: Marc
lender.loan_because: This is a perfect way to directly make a difference to hardworking, smart people who just need a little help.
lender.occupational_info: I help my clients market their businesses to other businesses who need their products or services.

lender.name: Alesia
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I own a small sign business in Dallastown, Pennsylvania.

lender.name: Raimundo
lender.loan_because: I believe the only way the world will get better is if each individual does their part in helping others. I have been blessed and I want to pass these blessings on to others.
lender.occupational_info: I maintain and repair machining and processing equipment at a production facility. We machine engine blocks and heads for a large international company.

lender.name: Brenda
lender.loan_because: We are all members of the family of man.
lender.occupational_info: I teach children to read and write.

lender.name: Jeff and Theresa
lender.loan_because: we believe in the mandate that to whom much is given, much is required.
lender.occupational_info: Jeff is a PhD student studying neuroscience. Theresa edits art books at a museum and works as a freelance writer.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I'm an idealist and a pragmatist. Kiva serves both those interests.

lender.name: Karl and Janis
lender.loan_because: We have been given so much and we want to give back - the stories are wonderful - so uplifting

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: I am

lender.name: David Gonzalez
lender.loan_because: El pobre carece de muchas cosas, pero el avaro carece de todo. (Séneca)

lender.name: Frank
lender.occupational_info: college professor teaching courses on nuclear issues

lender.name: scenario
lender.occupational_info: Living out the purpose I was created for

lender.name: Grant
lender.loan_because: Because this is a great idea, it keeps on giving!!!

lender.name: Claire Elise D.
lender.loan_because: A woman I do business with had a baby and I thought instead of a gift, lets invest the money in the name of Claire Elise.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: it's the most effective way of getting funds directly to people in need and it's gratifying watching them make the investment grow
lender.occupational_info: public health researcher

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: As a park ranger, my job was to protect the park's natural and cultural resources, this includes law enforcement duties, and to educate the public about these resources.

lender.name: Ivan Barriga
lender.loan_because: "each of us can work to change a small portion of events, and in the total of all those acts will be written the history of this generation" ~ Robert Kennedy

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: It's a great way to see that my donation will have a real affect.
lender.occupational_info: Sales and maintenance of industrial supplies. Expedited delivery of time critical products.

lender.name: KAREN
lender.loan_because: I believe everyone deserves a chance!!
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of volunteer work through an NGO and I take part in internationall youth seminars. That's untill I go for a Masters program in Criminology :D

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: My good friend Jen has taught me to look beyond the area that I live in and open my eyes to the needs of people around the world. I lead a good life, and I want to share that with people who just need a helping hand. What Jen has told me and made me aware of has made me realize that even doing something little can make a big difference. She will change the world one of these days, and I hope that little things like this will help her in her future endevours of making the world a better place.

lender.name: Lucious
lender.loan_because: l want to start a transport business. it's capital cost is $12,000.00. l'll repay the loan in 3yrs time. $720 monthly.
lender.occupational_info: business is the way of life in most third world countries

lender.name: Molly
lender.loan_because: I consider myself so fortunate, I'd like to help someone else, even a little bit, as others have helped me.

lender.name: Ian
lender.occupation: Grad Student/ Citizen of the World

lender.name: Ray
lender.loan_because: Poverty alleviation is one of the most pressing issues facing our global society in the 21st century. Micro-finance presents an innovative solution that empowers low income entrepreneurs throughout the developing world to improve their lives through self-sufficiency.

lender.name: Doug
lender.loan_because: I care. I can. I want to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help enable analysis of information to make better business decisions.

lender.name: Chevrotiere babes
lender.loan_because: I know it's difficult to survive in this world and with a little love and more spontaneous acts of kindness, we can change the world one person at a time. God bless KIVA
lender.occupational_info: I sell products that help with back pain. It's rewarding to help people feel better.

lender.name: Guillaume
lender.loan_because: I hope my little contribution will help people set up their business and have a better life

lender.name: Qamar
lender.loan_because: My organization is working for the development of women in Pakistan
lender.occupational_info: We work for the women our objective is to develope life style of the women in remote areas providing them aducation and training them for small business and also providing them law assistance as per rquirement

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can and that in and of itself is so awesome.
lender.occupational_info: I work at building self esteem and confidence with those who seek my help. I love working with people and am blessed everytime someone comes in and sits in my chair.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: A small amount for me can go a long way for someone else.
lender.occupational_info: I have led student service trips to Cambodia and Laos. I love both countries.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I want to make at least a small difference in this world.
lender.occupational_info: I fix things that break, primarily computers.

lender.name: Jonas
lender.loan_because: To make the world a beather place.

lender.name: Melody
lender.loan_because: It feels great! I'm very interested in the rest of the world and supporting development from the grassroots level

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage enterprise around the world
lender.occupational_info: I am a trainer, speaker and coach specialising in personal and business development

lender.name: AtTheWatersEdge.Org
lender.loan_because: we are blessed with resources.
lender.occupational_info: hands and feet-people of action.

lender.name: Jan
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: Marketing And Nonprofit

lender.name: Strobist
lender.loan_because: The opportunity cost (interest) of being without the money for a time is insignificant compared to the good it can do.
lender.occupational_info: On the web, I teach photographers how to make better photos by learning how to totally control light from small flashes.

lender.name: Marc LaFountain
lender.loan_because: It's an easy way to help others and it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I do public relations work for a state government agency that encourages people and businesses to prepare for emergencies. Our agency also coordinates the state's response and recovery efforts during emergencies.

lender.name: Pascal
lender.loan_because: its free, also, why not lend money for a great project?

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I want to be helpful
lender.occupational_info: I study accounting and business. I admire people who work hard with their own businesses.

lender.name: JJ5000
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Because many people in developing countries do not have access to the capital needed to improve their lives. Micro-loans are a proven success. Plus, my daughter (age 12) made me do it.
lender.occupational_info: I am an architect for the City of New York.

lender.name: Sylvie
lender.loan_because: I think that everyone must live in a good way as long as one works. We live in "rich" lands and we need to help people with economic difficulties.

lender.name: Jonathan
lender.loan_because: I care.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a law student who wants to use a legal education to make a difference in this world.

lender.name: Bradley
lender.loan_because: To try to help someone make their small world a better place, which will in turn help the larger world become a better place.
lender.occupational_info: I develop technologies for medical devices that aid in the treatment and prevention of illness. Also, in my spare time, I work to improve on current or develop new technologies for renewable energy.

lender.name: Terry
lender.loan_because: I am a buddhist and I believe that everyone is equal because we all want happinness and don't want suffering. I would like to help the poor not suffer as much even if it makes a small difference.
lender.occupational_info: I'm in grade 6 French emmersion elementary school.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: we all need a helping hand at some point in our lives.

lender.name: Karen and Rick
lender.loan_because: my husband and I are thankful for our large family and would like to share what we have with other families.
lender.occupational_info: my husband is a hospice nurse caring for small children and I work for a financial institution

lender.name: Marie
lender.loan_because: I want to do my small part in the world. I've been fortunate to grow up and experience wonderful opportunities in the US that most likely would not have been possible if my family stayed in Cambodia.
lender.occupational_info: Helping indigents here in the US and abroad.

lender.name: bruce
lender.loan_because: I think micro loans are the way to really help millions of people in a practical, direct way
lender.occupational_info: I make documentaries for television

lender.name: Kate and Kieron
lender.loan_because: We love to help people help themselves. This beats a charity donation, when our loans are repaid we can use that money to loan to somebody else. It allows you to help multiple people with the same cash.
lender.occupational_info: Kate teaches 6th grade (11 year old) and Kieron implements software for Cummins Power Generation.

lender.name: Margaret
lender.loan_because: I feel strongly that Kiva is a just, fair way of dealing with money.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses get organsed.

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: It makes me happy!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: I am blessed and therefore, should.
lender.occupational_info: Financially rewarding... but not much for social betterment!

lender.name: Mitch
lender.loan_because: I know it makes a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help create the physical framework for my society such as roads and places to build homes or businesses.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: government programs do not reach the people who have a need for money for their small businesses and I live in Mexico and see the need every day.
lender.occupational_info: Developing training in legal issues like harassment and discrimination.

lender.name: Yong
lender.loan_because: God has been good to our family, and we wanted to share some of those blessings.
lender.occupational_info: Retired.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.loan_because: I want to help people succeed in making their lives and communities healthier and stronger.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Information Technology sector (computers).

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: I want to help.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I like to help people who are working hard to help themselves.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: Perhaps I am able to help in a small way to ease the hardship, and make someone's life a little better.
lender.occupational_info: I love art, and like to be surrounded by beautiful paintings. My work is to help collectors acquire works of art that give them pleasure and add joy and beauty to their lives.

lender.name: Bethanne
lender.loan_because: I was given a wonderful gift certificate for my 50th birthday from a dear friend. I can't wait to help somebody achieve their dream when I use the gift I was given.
lender.occupational_info: The non profit organization I work for serves individuals who have Intellectual and Developmental Disabilities through social and leisure programs, educational and legislative advocacy.

lender.name: Dawn
lender.loan_because: I believe I have been very fortunate and others have not.
lender.occupational_info: People come to talk to me when they are having problems with managing their emotions or their behaviors.

lender.name: Khouria Jen
lender.loan_because: I feel like God has blessed me with so much in my life and as a way of being a good steward of what I've been given, I should give back to those who may need a little more to get out of poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a company that deals with U.S. Customs brokering for freight entering the US from Canada.

lender.name: Teresa
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of continuing to reloan the same money. it also empowers people by having them repay instead of grants that they do not have to pay back. It teaches the basic principal of "hard work pays off and makes one feel terrific."
lender.occupational_info: I am a recently retired Special Education Teacher.

lender.name: Eliza & Eva
lender.loan_because: We have so many blessings in our lives and would like to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: Eliza runs an NGO focused on ending bullying and harassment in K-12 schools in the United States. Eva is an independent film producer.

lender.name: Reg Keyworth
lender.loan_because: Its a really great feeling to help others in need out...and very cool indeed to support the entrepreneur spirit these good people have.
lender.occupational_info: Freelance professional guitarist. Writer/Producer. www.PlatinumMusicCreations.com www.sonicbids.com/regkeyworthband

lender.name: Sam
lender.loan_because: It's one of the few ways I can help global poverty while I'm still in school.

lender.name: Tim
lender.loan_because: When i have more than enough, I feel an obligation to help others make a better life for themselves. I am fortunate to be able to share what I have.
lender.occupational_info: I teach in a prison, and it is by turns rewarding, fun, frustrating, and scary. My path through life was not so different that those of my students; it is largely by grace and hard work that I am able to put on my coat and leave each night.

lender.name: Jarred
lender.loan_because: Proverbs 31:8-9
lender.occupational_info: I wish I could give more.

lender.name: Steve & Nancy
lender.loan_because: The World Bank does not lend money to people who want to start a business, work hard and make it on their own. I will.
lender.occupational_info: I started my own business. I work on peoples houses that need improvement, repairs or maintenance.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: Even in a land of plenty I know firsthand how hard it can be to get a small business started. I respect the courage and struggle of anyone trying to create a better life for themselves and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I own and operate a small business that designs and installs audio, video and computer products in the residential market

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: I get to bring children into the forest and onto the beach as part of their education.

lender.name: Mark & Mindy
lender.occupational_info: We own a two restaurants in Chicago and hope to open more.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: The idea that my small gift can really make a difference is exciting! Thanks to my son who gave me the gift certificate to Kiva as birthday present, I am able to begin taking small steps. And what a way to make a meaningful gift. It surely will outlast any material item I can think of.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am the afternoon manager of a small inn (or Bed and Breakfast), along with active involvement in several non profit organizations. One concerns health care advocacy and the other, building a cooperative federation of non profit organizations with work site giving campaigns.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: This feels like a way to make a real difference in someone's life.
lender.occupational_info: I help college students find jobs

lender.name: peter
lender.loan_because: ... I hope my contribution helps someone in some way.
lender.occupational_info: teacher and travel guide

lender.name: Moore Chiropractic
lender.loan_because: I have received a small business loan and would like to help others have the same opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Doctor of Chiropractic which is a speciality health care provider that uses the body's own ability to heal itself with out the use of drugs or surgery.

lender.name: Andy & Andrea
lender.loan_because: my wife and I loan because we feel responsible to give other people a chance to help themselves. This helps make the world a little bit smaller, which is a good thing.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: This is a way I can help people all over the globe achieve their dreams.

lender.name: Roland
lender.loan_because: Give a man a fish and you feed him for a day. Teach a man to fish and you feed him for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: Business Manager

lender.name: Tracy
lender.loan_because: it is such an easy way to help and goes so far. I am "paying forward" past kindnesses given to me and hope the recipients do the same. God bless.

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: Everybody needs a start in life; Kiva is a start.
lender.occupational_info: I do what I can, and that is all that can be asked.

lender.name: Kalli
lender.loan_because: I'd rather invest money in people committed to working hard and expanding their businesses than have it sit in a bank somewhere.
lender.occupational_info: I use my computer, my camera and my hands to make artwork for myself and others.

lender.name: Live Smart 360
lender.loan_because: I like to Share an opportunity for someone to successed in Changing thier Lives, because People LOVE to Live Smart, Travel ,Save and Make MONEY ALL Over the GLOBE!
lender.occupational_info: I Share Opportunities because Everyone Has A Chance Of SUCCESS! So You're in the Right Place this Time! ***** "Live Fit 360" ***** The Greatest Weight Loss product and program in the World. I have 5 questions for you: 1. Would you like to lose Fat? 2. Would you like to increase your Energy level? 3. Would you like to increase lean and shapely muscle and your Strength? 4. Would you like to Reduce Water Retention and Cellulite? 5. Would you like to be able to Recover from workouts for better Results? If your answer to any of those questions was "YES" then "LiveFit 360" is for YOU!Order the "LiveFit 360" Weight Loss & Fitness product Today from Alethia and create the body you've always been dreaming about! The Best Way to Earn while you Burn!!! All over The Globle!! Lock Your Spot, Join Today. Get in on the weekly calls! This is just TOO Awsome!

lender.name: Alison
lender.loan_because: I hope someone would do the same for me.

lender.name: Danny
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance, interaction with the world leads to a better world for our children tomorrow.
lender.occupational_info: investor

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it is the best way to raise people out of poverty and empower people to change their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I work in environmental management. I teach government people how to educate the public on environmental awareness.

lender.name: Arlene
lender.loan_because: its good to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a clothing designer and business owner from Toronto.

lender.name: Patrick Damsted
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: sichendra
lender.loan_because: See eParliament.org. Kiva seems to be a component of that.
lender.occupational_info: Some of my works in other's eyes: http://giis.netfirms.com/anupa.htm http://eparliament.org http://www.dec.uwi.edu/smarshall/itira/2003/abstracts.htm#edemocracy (3rd paper in the category) http://www.pledgebank.com/hospice

lender.name: Hugo
lender.loan_because: To make a small difference in a large world...
lender.occupational_info: I teach my collegues how to use Office software in a more effective manner.

lender.name: Sue
lender.loan_because: With a small amount of money people's lives are changed

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I want to keep finding ways to put my personal assets to work for local economic development.
lender.occupational_info: As a managing director with Gladstone Capital (www.gladstonecapital.com) I invest in companies with sales under $100MM on the strength of their cash flow. My investments are typically low amortizing loans which are junior to a bank or commercial lender and allow companies to grow into new markets, add capacity or enable the management to have an ownership interest in their businesses.

lender.name: JoEllen
lender.loan_because: every person deserves a chance to succeed

lender.name: Marian
lender.loan_because: I am happy to have the opportunity to help women who are trying to improve their lives and their children's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I answer the telephone for the computer dept of a company. People who work for the company call us to help them with their computer problems, and I direct them to the correct person.

lender.name: Jen76
lender.loan_because: It helps to make the world a community we all share in. People need each other, and if there is something I can do to help someone help themselves, I want to do it!
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother. That's a pretty universal job, so no description is needed!

lender.name: Sharon
lender.occupational_info: I help adults with mental retardation take care of themselves and their homes.

lender.name: Jimmy A.
lender.loan_because: One must be the change he wishes to see in the world.
lender.occupational_info: I facilitate Justice

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: If people are willing to borrow a little to make their lives better, I'm willing to loan a little.

lender.name: Lily
lender.loan_because: it is my duty as a human being to help others in need, if I have the ability to do so.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I have much more than I need and this is one small way I choose to share my resources with others.

lender.name: Vikki
lender.loan_because: I believe in people. I turned 57 on May 19, 2007. I thought this would be a perfect way to celebrate.
lender.occupational_info: The real estate company that employs me participates in a number of websites. It is my job to maintain the content on the websites. I am the executive assistant to the company's owner as well and do a variety of tasks for her and for our agents.

lender.name: Paco
lender.loan_because: I feel it is important to assist people that are willing to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I am the best friend to a crabby, hardworking old man.

lender.name: SALT
lender.loan_because: We are in solidarity with people who need a hand up as a matter of justice.
lender.occupational_info: We represent two Catholic Parishes whose members contribute to Social Justice projects like this.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I like the process of many people joining together to help others! I only wish I had more money to give to this worthy endeavor!

lender.name: Eugene Action Party
lender.loan_because: We started our group as a class project in our AP Comparative Politics class. As we learned more about the countries we were studying we felt that by fund-raising money and starting a Kiva account we could actually do something to help.

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I believe

lender.name: David and Beth
lender.loan_because: It makes a difference in someone's life who needs a chance and money to make life a little better.
lender.occupational_info: I work in risk operations at a corporation, analyzing fraud trends.

lender.name: Moody
lender.loan_because: there is need
lender.occupational_info: making things better where possible within the constraints of form.

lender.name: Jean
lender.loan_because: I want to help others directly to make life better for their families and communities.

lender.name: Bruce
lender.loan_because: I want to help, and it feels good.
lender.occupational_info: I am a game inventor, historian and writer.

lender.name: Arash
lender.loan_because: I like stories.
lender.occupational_info: Wintel Server Specialist

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I want to give back.
lender.occupational_info: I help people do things better. I try to use technology to do this.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: To give others a opportunity to enrich their lives, who inturn will then help others along the way.
lender.occupational_info: Creative, Rewarding and every day is a different challenge.

lender.name: Eve
lender.loan_because: I am learning how to share.

lender.name: Suhail
lender.loan_because: .... I can make a difference !
lender.occupational_info: I am a registered nurse and work in ICU setting.

lender.name: Elizabeth
lender.occupational_info: Well, I'm in High School in New York. I like History a lot, also English. I am also a lifeguard over the summer, it is not very interesting "work."

lender.name: MARK
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves, help them improve their lives through their own hard work by giving them a start.
lender.occupational_info: I review, monitor and manage a varied portfolio of investments in various businesses and industries

lender.name: Elisabeth
lender.loan_because: I discovered 'Kiva' in Share International Magazine ( www.share-international.org./ ) I think the concept of Kiva is brilliant. Giving small scale borrowers a chance to borrow at reasonable rates, and giving ordinary people who can lend, the opportunity to to find a borrower themselves, forges links between humans. That's got to be good for all.
lender.occupational_info: I am a literacy tuition specialist, who works one to one with children of all ages, who need specific help in one or more of the component areas of language learning.

lender.name: Posy
lender.loan_because: My first Kiva loan was funded by a Mother's Day gift certificate from my thoughtful daughter! It's a wonderful way to help mothers all around the world help their families.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It's a pleasure to be able to help people in a significant, but respectful way.

lender.name: BLam
lender.loan_because: I can. I feel that the first investment of a business is the quintessence of the actual success of the business. And lastly I feel that if I were to be in their position, I would wish for the same. It's only right to help.
lender.occupational_info: Investor. I buy/sell stocks.

lender.name: Australian friends
lender.loan_because: We want to help people gain better lives.

lender.name: Dana
lender.loan_because: Kiva's mission is one of the most amazing things that I have heard of in a long time. To be able to help someone change their own life is a gift, and one that I'm excited to take part in.

lender.name: Miss Figgins
lender.loan_because: "I long to accomplish a great and noble task, but my chief duty is to accomplish small tasks as if they were great and noble." Helen Keller
lender.occupational_info: I help design web sites and computer training guides so that they are simple for people to understand and use.

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to try and help those who are helping themselves. Especially those who are trying to create businesses that will empower them to provide jobs for others along with support them and their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am a software engineer who develops for enterprise level data storage devices.

lender.name: Edward
lender.loan_because: I think micro lending may have a much greater potential to make a large impact on the eradication of poverty than government programs and charity ever have.
lender.occupational_info: I help small businesses manage money and finance their operations.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do and I can.

lender.name: Judy
lender.occupation: New college graduate and RN mom

lender.name: rob & emily
lender.loan_because: As long as we have more than we need, we believe it is important to help those who have less than they need.

lender.name: Dominic
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the chance to fulfill their dreams.

lender.name: Thomas
lender.loan_because: a little less on my side is much more on the other side

lender.name: Joey
lender.loan_because: nothing is more important than life and nothing is more personal than business.
lender.occupational_info:
I am part of a Los Angeles-based creative team founded by a group of young adults and inspired by the youths of today. Specializing in high-impact promotions and marketing, brand creation, and identity development for a wide-ranging and influential group of businesses and private clients.
Our multi-disciplinary team consists of tomorrow's tastemakers and today's trendsetters with creative intentions. We are united by shared independent passions: modernity, film, technology, art, nightlife, music, and fashion

lender.name: Emily
lender.loan_because: I am able to
lender.occupational_info: Bringing a love for Spanish language and culture to students in DC

lender.name: Alastair
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I worked for a long time with Xerox Corporation.

lender.name: Carol
lender.loan_because: I want to encourage initiative by helping people to help themselves. Now, 3 years on and having just returned from a trip to the poorer areas of South America I am making my focus, housing.

lender.name: Tami & Dave
lender.loan_because: We respect anyone who is making an effort to succeed in this life. We understand that we are lucky to have the opportunities available to us, and we'd like to help someone who doesn't have the same kind of luck.
lender.occupational_info: We both have Ph.D.s in Mathematics. Tami is a wedding planner. Dave is a postdoc.

lender.name: Coach Bob
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I teach kids sports.

lender.name: Patrice
lender.loan_because: I want a better world; a world where there are fewer fences; fewer boundaries, and hostilities. I may not be able to change the actions of governments, nor greedy individuals, and corporations; but perhaps my small actions, just might touch someone's life, and make it a little bit better. I believe all of humanity, is family; the family of mankind; regardless of where we are in the world. As an African American, many see me, as lesser, and lower, and deserving of a poorer quality of life. I cannot change their beliefs; but I can live my life, in a manner, that touches other human beings, as if, they are my extended family; because I believe we are all, just that, distant family.
lender.occupational_info: I work for human development, and evolution

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an admirable way to fight poverty. Microfinance is a convincing, practical, longterm solution to poverty. Entrepreneurialism is the backbone of American success, and establishing that in the third world will help end poverty. It is better and more convincing than the "throwing money at the problem" solution of many charities.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a student...Political Science major at Xavier University in Cincinnati, Ohio

lender.name: San Francisco Blue Walk
lender.loan_because: To give means to receive. To empower another means to empower oneself. In order to have PERSONAL peace, one must help create peace LOCALLY and GLOBALLY.
lender.occupational_info: San Francisco Blue Walk is a Weekly candle light walk for PERSONAL, LOCAL and GLOBAL PEACE. Find out how you can take part from ANYWHERE IN THE WORLD by visiting the website: www.sfbluewalk.com

lender.name: Bindi
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I want to make a profound and lasting impact on another person.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a full time student in university.

lender.name: Sandra
lender.loan_because: I think Kiva is the future - helping entrepreneurs worldwide start or develop their ventures.
lender.occupational_info: I help people think about their career goals and how they can reach them, and advise companies on recruiting from us.

lender.name: Senior Current Issues 07
lender.loan_because: The Senior Current Issues class of 2007 feels inspired to donate to Kiva in order to provide the third world with an opportunity to better their economy, which ultimately allows individuals of the third world to better their lives. Furthermore, many of us feel that due to the privileges we have in the United States it is our responsibility to help others who are less fortunate than ourselves. It is important to help people achieve their dreams and we do so by donating through micro loans. Finally, we donate because we want to make a change in the world. We believe that there is no better way to change the world than contributing to the people in it because people are the future of this world. Additionally, we feel that micro loans show the advantages of sharing money but most importantly what sharing compassion can actually do for this world. Also, we have spent a lot of time learning about the third world and realize the poverty that consumes it and the masses of people who suffers from it daily. Donating is a concrete way for us to interact with the third world, but most of all to lend a helping hand and show our concern for others who are underprivileged.
lender.occupational_info: We are just a group of students that care about being awake to the world, and want to give everyone an opportunity to make their lives a better one to live.

lender.name: Angela
lender.loan_because: It easy and extremely helpful for people in other countries.
lender.occupational_info: I have two kids that I take care of 24/7. :)

lender.name: Cantesco Corporation
lender.loan_because: It's easy to do, the amounts are small and yet they have a significant impact on the lives of others.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I lived in Africa as a young child. My parents immigrated to Canada when I was 8. I've benefitted enormously from living in such a peaceful, tolerant and wealthy country. I run my own business, own my own home, and have raised and educated a wonderful daughter. Now, I would like to help people who are trying to make a difference for themselves, their families and communities in other, less fortunate parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I research, write and edit reports, strategies and other public policy documents concerned with programs and services for citizens and their communities.

lender.name: Ron
lender.loan_because: I believe entreperneurship can lead to success for people all over the world
lender.occupational_info: Manufacturer of composite and aluminium constructions

lender.name: Joanne
lender.loan_because: I like to help out folk who don't want charity but want to make a real difference to their lives

lender.name: Dod & Talor
lender.loan_because: Everyone involved benefits

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: this is clearly the best way to help people that really need it. It feels pretty good too.
lender.occupational_info: I work to keep computer systems and networks secure on the Internet.

lender.name: Ellen
lender.occupational_info: I write children's books.

lender.name: Brianna
lender.loan_because: it is such an easy way to help alleviate poverty!

lender.name: Tom Chance
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people the means to improve their lives.

lender.name: Austin
lender.loan_because: I've heard the difference that the amount i would spend on two cd's makes to people and i want to help bring poeple out of poverty in a way that gives them dignity and self-respect.
lender.occupational_info: Family business in manufacturing and helping run a summer camp for kids.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: You can teach a person to fish... but it helps if they can afford a fishing pole! Having built 3 businesses from scratch, I strongly associate with entreprenuers in developing countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a 21st century auctioneer with a 19th century work ethic.

lender.name: Poli
lender.loan_because: Giving that help I never received. We fight and squabble over problems that we ourselves create. We have places of "faith" that urge others to be separate from those who believe otherwise...? We need to come together as one not create more separation!
lender.occupational_info: Bringing Greene to the world!

lender.name: Evan
lender.loan_because: there are people that need the help.

lender.name: Megan
lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I design (and sometimes build) costumes for theatrical and dance productions and I also work part-time in a coffee shop.

lender.name: Odd Christer
lender.loan_because: It's a good way to see direct results and hopefully it also contributes to the people and community around the person getting the loan.

lender.name: Stephen
lender.loan_because: I want to help people.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a copy editor.

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: Mom always said to give something back. I think that most people only need a little help to go a long way. Plus, I have non-specific liberal guilt.
lender.occupational_info: I help make sure that my company does its work right. I do this by examining how we do things and then give them ideas on how to do better. I am not popular.

lender.name: Maria
lender.loan_because: This is a great idea!

lender.name: Sally, Ross, CA
lender.loan_because: I want to connect with people around the world. We can all add to each other's success.
lender.occupational_info: I do a lot of different things for the people I work with so that their time is spent being productive. My favorite task is helping to organize conferences.

lender.name: Patricia
lender.loan_because: I care.

lender.name: Aden and Esan
lender.loan_because: I got a very generous gift from a family friend to start a Kiva account. What better gift than to give other people the chance to be successful in life?

lender.name: tricia
lender.loan_because: I love helping and don't have much to offer. This site makes me feel that I am making a difference. Even a little is better than none!
lender.occupational_info: I run the lunch program at a school. I order the food and create the menus for the students.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I believe that we all should help others that are economically impoverished, and by providing the loans helps out a vast majority of individuals to rebuild there lives.
lender.occupational_info: Simply a caring individual offering a helping hand now and again...

lender.name: Juha
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: KTB
lender.loan_because: ....to whomever much is given, of him will much be required.....
lender.occupational_info: park ranger

lender.name: Jimena
lender.loan_because: I believe in the people’s potential to help each other. I think Kiva gives a perfect opportunity to do so by enhancing trust and responsibility.
lender.occupational_info: I am Mexican and I have had the opportunity to live and work in several countries. I was a consultant and a Kiva translator and now I am a business school student.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: Every entrepreneur needs a break. Access to capital is a critical part of what stiffles or grows great companies. The best way I know how to make a difference is to help others create jobs for their communities. In a small way, I'm accomplishing this.
lender.occupational_info: A serial entrepreneur with the goal of making meaning in everything I'm involved in. Life is too short not to be passionate.

lender.name: Byron & Laura
lender.loan_because: The small amount i loan can make a big difference in peoples lives. Unlike the world bank this money goes directly to the people to help solve economic problems in their country.
lender.occupational_info: Self emlpoyed .

lender.name: Sharon
lender.loan_because: I think it is a fantastic way to help people in need to help themselves

lender.name: ~Toby & Heather~
lender.loan_because: We are also self employed! We admire people that have the motivation to work for themselfs.
lender.occupational_info: We have a trucking company. We haul livestock and have Dozers and Water Truck s for Fire Supoort Services. I also buy and sell real estate.

lender.name: Sallie & Shane
lender.loan_because: We want to help!

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: It is an honor to be able to help those who want to help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help companies buy property and build homes, offices, and stores.

lender.name: Mike Olmstead
lender.loan_because: I consider it a privilege to be allowed to help. May the God(s) shine on You, Your families and Your businesses.

lender.name: Jennifer Simoniello
lender.loan_because: I want to help someone help themselves and support agriculture at the same time.
lender.occupational_info: Department of Animal Science at the University of Connecticut

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because:
Everyone deserves a chance.
One latte or cocktail a day less can make the difference in another persons life.
lender.occupational_info: Business to business sales

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I think that it really is a revolutionary grassroots way to help people directly.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: My mission at work is "to help others succeed".. Kiva seems like a perfect extension into my private life...
lender.occupational_info: I work in Marketing in the Foodservice industry... working with manufacturers and our buyers to bring new items to our customers....

lender.name: David & Wife Ajla
lender.loan_because: A young child in Chiapas , Mexico gave my daughter some small pottery toys and then women in a small village in central Turkey in 2005 gave my wife and myself a jar of hand picked pine nuts. Some of the nicest people we have met in our travels were also those with less. We cannot repay their generosity and kindness.
lender.occupational_info:
Ajla works in local government. She also has worked for the United Nations and various NGO's.
David retired from a 30 year career in law enforcement and has also worked for the United Nations in Bosnia and East Timor as well the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe, in Bosnia and Kosovo.

lender.name: Simon
lender.loan_because: I want to pay it forward
lender.occupational_info: I buy and sell finely used books all over the world.

lender.name: A&L
lender.loan_because: We are all in the same boat, so we need to help each other

lender.name: Timothy
lender.loan_because: I want to give people the opportunity to better their lives.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: If people had not given me a chance, had faith in my abilities I would not be able to loan. QED
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales person who is fortunate to sell enjoyment to others

lender.name: Laya
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Saasu.com
lender.loan_because: We see Kiva as one of the best ways to deliver on the goals of the Saasu foundation. you can see more at http://www.saasu.com/foundation/
lender.occupational_info: easy online accounting

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: It is a privilege for me to be a small part of the effort to help other people help themselves by improving their businesses. What a wonderful way to connect people on the Internet for such a good cause.
lender.occupational_info: I am a librarian and teacher in a middle school.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: “He who wished to secure the good of others, has already secured his own.” - Confucius

lender.name: Olivia
lender.loan_because: My Aunt Heidi and my Uncle Tony gave me the gift of responsibility for my very first birthday. I loan to help other families with children. I also chose my first loan in honor of my Aunt Regina, who just graduated from Pharmacy school.

lender.name: Daniela
lender.loan_because: Enterprise and small business creation is the best way to financial independency.
lender.occupational_info: I sell real estate

lender.name: Lynn and Brett
lender.loan_because: It is an easy and fun way to help people. We admire these people's drive and ambition.
lender.occupational_info: clothing and jewelry designers sales representative

lender.name: Debb
lender.loan_because: I remember the first time someone believed in me and gave me a chance to achieve my dreams.

lender.name: AJAY
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves a chance to stand on his or her own feet
lender.occupational_info: i create from what i learn

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: microfinance makes sense and because of the satisfaction I get knowing that through these loans real people are bettering their lives.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: I've had many blessings and this is a chance to share with others in a meaningful way.
lender.occupational_info: My career was in newspapers. I'm now a free-lance book reviewer.

lender.name: Anne
lender.loan_because: It's such a great opportunity to help our neighbors increase their earning power. I am very grateful that I am able to participate..
lender.occupational_info: I'm a retired horticulturist.

lender.name: Bluejacket01
lender.loan_because: because I can.
lender.occupational_info:
And again I say unto you, It is easier for a camel to go through the eye of a needle, than for a rich man to enter into the kingdom of God. Matthew 19:24
A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. Lao-tzu, The Way of Lao-tzu - Chinese philosopher (604 BC - 531 BC)

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: In giving, I receive

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: Simply because I enjoy helping others!
lender.occupational_info: I recruit MBA students to study at INSEAD.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: It's great to have the opportunity to support people striving for a better life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with antenatal care, that is with looking after pregnant women and helping them have the healthiest possible babies. I also work with other aspects of reproductive health such as family planning and preventing infections.

lender.name: Matt and Jennifer
lender.loan_because: We want to share what we have to enable others to succeed.
lender.occupational_info: Matt works with teenagers who are in need of social and spiritual guidance and also works as an English teacher; Jennifer teaches reading to children in public school who have difficulty learning because of health issues; she also directs the musical portion of worship services at our church.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: trade not aid anyone?
lender.occupational_info: Making computers work together in a clever way

lender.name: Frederick & Scott
lender.loan_because: A century of gifts have done nothing to alleviate global poverty.

lender.name: Christina
lender.loan_because: Investing in people is safer than the stockmarket.
lender.occupational_info: I assist an attorney who helps people with their legal needs.

lender.name: Maureen
lender.loan_because: I believe in the potential of all people and want to provide opportunities for success for more people.
lender.occupational_info: I volunteer where I can make a difference for others.

lender.name: Stefan
lender.loan_because:
I think that project specific help is way better than just pumping out money to the big charity organizations.
I also believe that aid can get the receivers into a struggle, wondering why they should ever try to improve their life if they can get money for not doing anything at all.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I want to share some of the good fortune I've had in my life.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an association of long-term care providers to ensure that they can continue to provide quality care to the seniors in their facilities.

lender.name: Jeanne
lender.loan_because: it's an investment in global prosperity.

lender.name: Helder
lender.loan_because: $25 for me is almost nothing but its a lot for this people

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: Someone recently reminded me that I'm rich with life. I AM lucky to have the life I am living. Why not help make someone else's life better? Especially when they already want to help themselves

lender.name: Gia
lender.loan_because: I like the way the Kiva organization is set up where you are not just giving money but lending it so the people have to work just like everyone else.

lender.name: Hotel Adriark Book Club
lender.loan_because: We like to play, but at the same time, while we're playing, we're doing something that gives back.
lender.occupational_info: Read about us here!

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: It feels really good to be a GOOD Banker!
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers, and I also work with Metals. I make things from Metals and I Fix computers.

lender.name: Hillsboro Presbyterian
lender.loan_because: Our Church is always looking for more ways to help others in need. This is one of the best way we have found to help people in other countries.

lender.name: Sylvia & Jeff
lender.loan_because: We were given the money as a birthday present from our son.
lender.occupational_info: We are now retired from social work . Currently we are travelling around Australia and New Zealand

lender.name: Tyler
lender.loan_because: I know what it is like to start a small business, and how challenging and rewarding it can be. I hope to empower others to grow their own businesses.
lender.occupational_info: I run a graphic design studio in San Francisco, and we create printed materials and websites for small start-up businesses and large international brands.

lender.name: Ann
lender.loan_because: it's my human responsibility to help others and to give as much as I can.
lender.occupational_info: I help refugees go through the resettlement process in West Michigan.

lender.name: Shauna
lender.loan_because: everyone deserves a chance.
lender.occupational_info:
I teach history to students 16-18 years old.
Gianni owns a small Italian restaurant in our town.

lender.name: Harvey
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are willing to work hard to achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired farmer from Ohio.

lender.name: Donno
lender.loan_because: I want to support micro-lending which holds promise of ending poverty on our planet.
lender.occupational_info: Helping people & companies design profitable products.

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: it empowers people to improve their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I teach world history and economics. I also teach students about problems of poverty in the world, and encourage them to be a part of the solution.

lender.name: dexter
lender.loan_because: shouldn't we all?

lender.name: Dunsirn Family
lender.loan_because: I'm inspired by the will and dedication those in challenging areas of the world put forth into making their lives and communities better. Never give up.
lender.occupational_info: Own a IT healthcare consulting company.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: it's the right thing to do.

lender.name: Heather & Daniel
lender.loan_because: I want to give someone an opportunity.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: Microloans are a terrific way to empower people who are neglected by the world's financial sector. I hope that this sort of seed money will, over years, elevate the living standards and quality for people around the world.

lender.name: Amy
lender.loan_because: I'm a nice person.
lender.occupational_info: I work in Philanthropy. I cook, read and write by day and cuddle my husband and cat by night.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: I believe that Kiva is a great way to help out people that want to help themselves! Their stories are so very inspiring.

lender.name: Jeannie
lender.loan_because: How could I not loan when I have been blessed with so much? To go with ignorance to other's struggles is truly discouraging. I loan because if I didn't, I would not be human.
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a high school student who is trying to learn more about the world around me so I can do whatever I can to make it a better place.

lender.name: COLOR & Tailor
lender.loan_because: Because we are all stewards, and it is our duty to empower others to new levels of stewardship so they in turn can do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: Colorful and tailored home furnishings.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I invest in things of value and the greatest value lies in the dreams of honest, hard-working people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: I invest and raise capital for startup companies.

lender.name: Lawrence
lender.loan_because: I have been fortunate enough to be able to assist.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: Melanie and I want to help people who live in gemstone source countries. We feel that they do not get their fair share of the value of the rough that they sell, so we want to level the playing field by loaning some of our profits back to such countries.
lender.occupational_info: I travel frequently between the United States and Thailand where I buy rough and cut gemstones. I sell mostly to private clients here in the U.S.

lender.name: Helge
lender.loan_because: I started a freelance business in 2002 and received a financial help for startups for the first six month. I think it is a great idea to help people to start their own business. So they can do what they really like, serve other people and find a new perspective for life.
lender.occupational_info: I write articles for Germanys mostly visited news website, for ex. about the latest mobile phones, new internet services and gadgets.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: I think it is awesome that we can now be more connected to the world
lender.occupational_info: I treat children with cancer and do research into how cancer cells resist cancer medicines.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: I believe that this kind of lending is the best path to alleviating poverty while generating empowerment.
lender.occupational_info: I study international affairs with a focus on economic and social development and hope to some day start an organization that like Kiva, will strive to make a difference in the world.

lender.name: Non Vintage Apparel
lender.loan_because: We should share with those who are less fortunate than us.
lender.occupational_info: Drinking and clothing.

lender.name: Jan-Willem
lender.loan_because: It makes me feel good. I also admire the initiative from the Kiva founders and like to support their efforts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Dutch national living in Thailand for 15 years already. It's a wonderful country, with very nice people. I arrived in Bangkok in 1992 as a freelance journalist for Dutch newspapers and radio; it was very interesting and exciting, but money was a bit (too) tight, so I switched to sales & marketing of polyester mosquito nets for a Dutch export company in Bangkok. It was nice for many years until the Chinese competition became a bit too strong. I switched again, and have recently worked as a consultant for the United Nations regional office in Bangkok. There are surely many very good people working within the UN organization, but unfortunately it's a horrible bureacracy. Currently I am considering to go back to The Netherlands, but after 15 years abroad, things have obviously changed at home - and some of my friends warn me that I might not fit in anymore. We'll see.

lender.name: Marion
lender.loan_because: I believe in microcredit!

lender.name: Camilo
lender.loan_because: I believe in entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Jenny
lender.occupational_info: I live in Hong Kong and teach at an international secondary school.

lender.name: Zachary
lender.loan_because: I sold my car before joining the Peace Corps and wanted to put that money to good use.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a small, rural village in Morocco to promote environmental education in the nearby national park.

lender.name: Davide
lender.loan_because: chi vuol muovere il mondo, muova se stesso - (thanks to Socrate and Phibbi)

lender.name: Margret & Reinhard
lender.loan_because: It is only a small contribution for a couple of us to help fighting against poverty. If everyone participates, we can make the world better! And it's really fun!
lender.occupational_info: Software Sales within International Enterprises

lender.name: M. Frances
lender.loan_because: I've visited Ghana and seen the need for us (Americans), who posess and consume so much of the world's goods , to share with those who have so little that would greatly improve their quality of life...I am also a Bible believing Christian who follows Jesus' directive that we care for the poor.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Senior Pastor in a Black Baptist Church

lender.name: Connie
lender.loan_because: I have been so lucky and blessed in life. I want to share.

lender.name: François
lender.loan_because: Thanks to Kiva organization for providing an amazing opportunity to help people throughout the world.
lender.occupational_info: For me the top priority is to alleviate suffering whenever and where it arises.

lender.name: The Kisses
lender.loan_because: "Teach a man to fish and he will eat for a lifetime"

lender.name: Li-Mod&Con07Spring
lender.loan_because: I want to bring blessings to others.
lender.occupational_info: Discover and transmit knowledge.

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: Micro-credit makes a real difference. By loaning through Kiva I can show others how easy it is to make a difference.

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: people with good business ideas deserve a line of credit, especially when the banks say no.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.occupational_info: I am an immunologist, studying how the immune system works to protect our bodies from disease and infection.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because:
I want to make a difference. I want to be able to help others reach their goals and live out their dreams. Everyone deserves someone to believe in them. I believe - I wish more people did too.
We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give. -Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: I am currently a International Development / African Studies major at Michigan State University in East Lansing,Michigan, USA. I also have a partime job working at a grocery store where I am a clerk. In my sparetime outside of working and school, I love spending time with my family and friends, relaxing, listening to music and volunteering my time in my community. ** My primary interest is in Africa, especially Ghana where I have visited in August of 2006. I visited there for a study abroad trip through my school. It is the most amazing place I have ever been. I will be returning to Ghana (Kumasi actually) in December to visit. I hope to one day relocate to Ghana to live. I enjoyed it so much I did not want to come back to the U.S!!! :)

lender.name: Drew
lender.occupation: WGBH National Center for Accessible Media
lender.loan_because: I saw the special on Frontline World while eating lunch and was inspired by the idea that so much good could come from such a simple act.
lender.occupational_info: I work at WGBH part of Public Television, we produce shows like Frontline that aired a special on Kiva in Uganda.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I am able to and its such a little thing to do for us that are so blessed to live in a land of prosperity. It also helps people to help themselves and is not a handout. I can certainly afford to lose the small amout I have lent but believe that most of it will be paid back to be lent again and again. This is a great program.

lender.name: Anna and Bryan
lender.loan_because: It makes sense for all of us that people have opportunities to realize their potential.

lender.name: Stormie
lender.loan_because: I have extra.

lender.name: sherry
lender.loan_because: I feel like being able to give to real people trying to better themselves helps me make a tangible difference in the world
lender.occupational_info: I care for a wide range of medically ill and trauma patients in a very fast paced emergency room

lender.name: Vivek Mohan
lender.loan_because: I am what I am today because someone else gave me a loan to make my education a reality. 'Pay it forward....'
lender.occupational_info: I work with patients that cant walk or walk with alot of pain. I operate on them hoping that they will have a normal life afterwards

lender.name: Cynthia
lender.loan_because: Small things can make a big difference!

lender.name: Michell
lender.loan_because: Because abundance should be shared, and I believe that what might seem trivial to one person can give someone else hope and faith. Always hoping that others may succeed and make their lives better.

lender.name: Roy
lender.loan_because: Because when I have spent time overseas, complete strangers have shown me kindness and love. I want to share that same type of kindness with others.

lender.name: Anton
lender.loan_because: Giving a micro loan may be one of the best ways of helping people

lender.name: Betty
lender.loan_because: We all need to make the world a better place. This is one way.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired high school English teacher. My life's work has always been "children" in one form or another.

lender.name: Brandon
lender.loan_because: It doesn't have the stigma of charity, but doesn't exploit people who need help like a first world bank or local loan shark would, and puts people ahead of profits, which is the way it should always be.
lender.occupational_info: I go to the local University and work in a kitchen part time.

lender.name: Sandy
lender.loan_because: This is a GREAT program and great cause. I spent some time in West Africa and really saw true entrepreneurship at work. It feels great to support that in emerging countries.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Human Resources Director at a company.I help employees and managers be the best they can be. I also have side companies that I have formed.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: Everyone needs a fighting chance. I know how it feels to be down on your luck. If a little bit of money can help another person, who am I to deny that?
lender.occupational_info: Well, it puts a new lease on life. It is such an incredible feeling to help someone who before this organization wasn't helped, is amazing.

lender.name: The Riedmans
lender.loan_because: it is great way to change the world.
lender.occupational_info: Selling technology to improve manufacturing & warehousing work flows.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can and it feels great to help someone out.

lender.name: Karimah
lender.loan_because: they need it
lender.occupational_info: I am a student. I work primarily to raise money to help others and so I eat on occasion. I am supported by my family, so I feel like I should support those who are not.

lender.name: Janet
lender.loan_because: This is one of the best thing I see thus Far that can help to eradicate Extreme poverty
lender.occupational_info: I work with networks; I help make the internet work

lender.name: Alicia
lender.loan_because: I can. If I can make a difference in the life of someone who is motivated to help themselves, why not give them a leg up through a microloan?
lender.occupational_info: I work for a university. My job is to try to figure out what the university should become 10 years in the future - and what needs to be done to make that happen.

lender.name: Benjamin
lender.loan_because: If someone out there wants to better their situation, I will help.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: The feeling of direct involvement that Kiva gives me makes my small efforts seem much more concentrated and meaningful.

lender.name: SLAAP
lender.loan_because: We loan because we care about making a difference in someone's life...
lender.occupational_info: We Sustain Land Animals and People through Fair Trade Sales.

lender.name: Fedua Sarah
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I help people either buy or sell homes.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Gigi
lender.loan_because: I want to show my support for people who are working for a better life for themselves and their families!
lender.occupational_info: I install new computer systems and teach people how to use them.

lender.name: Bill
lender.loan_because: We should all do more to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I study fish to help make sure there are enough fish for everyone.

lender.name: Trina
lender.loan_because: This is the easiest and most effective way I've seen yet to make a difference in the devloping world.
lender.occupational_info: I chase, feed, clothe, and wipe the tears of our four little boys, ages four and under. Before doing this, I taught fourth grade and wrote a children's book. I also spent 4 summers in Zambia helping to start a school for AIDS orphans.

lender.name: Phil and Marilyn
lender.loan_because: It is an excellent way to assist people in small business and help make the world a better place.
lender.occupational_info: We are goodwill ambassadors for the USA at a time when we need positive actions to offset the wars and greed demonstrated by most large corporations.

lender.name: Jordon
lender.loan_because: along the way others have helped me.
lender.occupational_info: I pastor a new church in the middle of Canada.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I want to help somebody else.
lender.occupational_info: I provide regulatory and scientific expertise to pharmaceutical and petrochemical companies.

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info:
I sell books for a living. I also do beadwork and I spend far too much time online.
I am also a member of kivafriends.org.

lender.name: Boris
lender.whereabouts: Rio de Janeiro Rio de Janeiro

lender.name: Carla
lender.loan_because: Its a wonderful way to empower people in a big way with a small amount of money. I feel really good about being able to give something to someone to help them have a better life. I'm blessed to have everything I want and need.
lender.occupational_info: I supervise office workers and write contracts for services needed by my department.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: It's necessary.

lender.name: Helen
lender.loan_because: I want to fund businesses that will not only help their owners, but also their community to grow and thrive.
lender.occupational_info: I am a mother to 2 wonderful girls, 5 & 1.

lender.name: Taylor
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place.

lender.name: RTG
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is all most people want and need. Give someone a fish and they eat for a day; teach someone to fish and they eat for a lifetime.
lender.occupational_info: I care for people.

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone should have the opportunity to do a job they love and want to help them succeed.
lender.occupational_info: I am a financial analyst for a regional HMO.

lender.name: Chris & Jon
lender.loan_because:
I remember saying at one point in my life "I would be happy just to pay my bills on time." That goal was eventually realized, and I would like to help someone else who works as hard as I did to get past a similar moment and reach a goal.
I'm not of the mindset that you need to blow something up to make it better, and I'd also rather the world know that Americans are not destructive people, despite our current Presidential and Congressional representation. If this serves both the individual in need and the American public in any small percentage, the effort is well worth it.
lender.occupational_info: I am a Director of Sales for Hilton Hotels. I deal daily with people from all around the globe, and truly love it.

lender.name: Spartan
lender.loan_because:
I can and it is fun to be sure! Moreover because I was in the same position as the Kiva clients and to some degree I still am at times.
You see I started my first business when I was seven years old for fun. A couple years later it became something of a necessity when my mother developed cancer. Anyway, I have pretty much worked for myself ever since with the exception of nearly a decade of time I spent in the military.
lender.occupational_info: I try to educate and empower people to make improvements in their lives.

lender.name: Jason
lender.loan_because: I believe it's a great way to help others around the world improve their quality of life, while reducing and hopefully eventually eliminating poverty one person at a time.

lender.name: Steve & Natalie
lender.loan_because:
As citizens of the United States we are incredibly blessed, and it is our responsibility to demonstrate to the world that we as individuals are better than our government.
Our Lord Jesus expects us to put others first before ourselves, as He did. Whatever money we have doesn't belong to us, it belongs to Him. Where else should these funds go except to His children? It's wonderful to have the opportunity to do something positive in this life!
Matthew 25:14-30

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people who are working hard trying to better themselves through hard work and determination.
lender.occupational_info: I assist small businesses and their owners obtain working capital

lender.name: Debalina
lender.loan_because: I want to enable people to become independent.

lender.name: quentin
lender.loan_because: I love the idea of helping people who are already working hard for themselves and their community.

lender.name: Claudia
lender.loan_because: I believe in microfinance.

lender.name: Kim, Max, Adam
lender.loan_because: Because we're lucky enough to be able to.

lender.name: Dave
lender.loan_because: I can and know it may help.
lender.occupational_info: Manage a large transportation company
